Header: Troops Assist Douse Mini Fire in Kandy
Content: Three Officers and 20 Other Ranks of 8 Vijayabahu Infantry Regiment (VIR) and 2 (Volunteer) Sri Lanka Sinha Regiment (SLSR) under command to the 11 Division of the Security Force Headquarters - Central (SFHQ-Cen) joined hands with fire-fighters and Police personnel to extinguish a sudden fire that broke out at a  shop with plastic-wares in Kandy city late Friday (1) evening. Troops together with Police and fire-fighters doused the fire and prevented its spread within a few minutes.
